argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nnon | |- ( A e. _om -> A e. On ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nnon | |- ( B e. _om -> B e. On ) |
| 3 |  | #P_onacda | |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> ( A +o B ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( A +o B ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_carden2b | |- ( ( A +o B ) ~~ ( A +c B ) -> ( card ` ( A +o B ) ) = ( card ` ( A +c B ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( card ` ( A +o B ) ) = ( card ` ( A +c B ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nnacl | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( A +o B ) e. _om ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cardnn | |- ( ( A +o B ) e. _om -> ( card ` ( A +o B ) ) = ( A +o B ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( card ` ( A +o B ) ) = ( A +o B ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( card ` ( A +c B ) ) = ( A +o B ) ) |
